total-budget.notes: There is an extent to which this question is not applicable to UNOPS as it is not a donor agency. UNOPS does publish a ‘budget estimate’ for next financial biennium which is submitted to and approved by the Executive Board comprised of member states. This budget estimate sets out projected management costs and the revenues necessary to cover those costs (UNOPS is self-financing and does not receive core UN funding) rather than establish a disbursement framework of funds to beneficiary country programmes.The current biennium estimate is published here: http://www.unops.org/SiteCollectionDocuments/EB%20documents/2011/DPOPS2011-5.pdf

document-link.notes: Strategic Plan documents, Annual Reports to the Executive Board, Biennial Budget estimates, risk management frameworks and a variety of financial, project management, infrastructure and procurement policies are available at www.unops.org and as part of the Organization IATI file.

title.notes: No current plans to publish in recipient language

description.notes: No current plans to publish in recipient language

participating-org.notes: Captured and available on project information platform
As noted in the first review, since we are listing 'project' type aid in our activity set we could say that 'UNOPS' is the 'accountable' organization for each activity entry.

location.notes: Activities are geocoded according to UDCP/AidData methodology

sector.notes: UNOPS does not have a policy mandate and as such does not have an internal set of sector codes referring to the areas of the recipient’s economic or social development that the activity intends to foster. There are results-based management indicators known as the 'Goals' of the 2010-2013 Strategic Plan, which are mapped to activities once per year for the Annual Report which could be added to the system however they would be of little use in the area of development coordination.

document-link.notes: This system is fully capable of publishing project doucments for all activities. To date, selected project documents were published where the documents in question have already been made publicly available by the project partner (MPTF hub, Sida). Please see the example under the 'documents' tab on the following link: https://data.unops.org/index.htm#SegmentCode=ORG&FocusCode=DATA_OVERVIEW&EntityCode=PROJECT_ID&EntityValue=00077183##SectionCode=OVERVIEW

activity-website.notes: Each active project ID has a matching entry on our data.unops.org platform

conditions.notes: UNOPS can say 'N' for all activities on this question.

result.notes: Likely progress to be made in the area of publishing outputs rather that outcomes and impacts but no firm timelines available at this date. UNOPS will continue to follow the developments of the standard in this area.
